greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least n^k with same leading decimal digit as n, k>1.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5995
maple: if floor(m/10^ilog10(m)) = t then return m fi
mathematica: fi[n_] := First[IntegerDigits[n]]; Table[k = 2; While[fi[x = n^k] != fi[n], k++]; x, {n, 21}] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jul 02 2013 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 04 2002
